Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: “oh ana anga!, Pitani mukafufuze za Yosefe pamodzi ndi m’bale wake, ndipo musataye mtima ndi chisomo cha Mulungu. Ndithudi palibe amene amataya mtima ndi chisomo cha Mulungu kupatula anthu osakhulupirira.”

Ndipo pamene iwo adalowa kwa Yosefe, iwo adati, “Oh inu Mfumu yolemekezeka! Ife pamodzi ndi anthu athu tapeza mavuto, ndipo ife tabweretsa ndalama zochepa motero tiyesereni chakudya chokwanira ndipo tipatseni china chaulere. Ndithudi Mulungu amalipira anthu ochita zabwino.”
Iye adati, “Kodi inu muli kudziwa zimene mudamuchitira Yosefe ndi m’bale wake pamene inu simumadziwa?”

Iwo adati, “Kodi iwe ndiwedi Yosefe?” Iye adati, “Ine ndine Yosefe ndipo uyu ndi m’bale wanga. Mulungu, ndithudi, watikomera mtima ife. Ndithudi iye amene amaopa Mulungu ndi kupirira molimba ndithudi Mulungu sasokoneza malipiro a anthu ochita zabwino.”
Iwo adati, “Pali Mulungu, ndithudi, Mulungu wakulemekezani inu kuposa ife ndipo, ndithudi, ife tidali olakwa.”
Iye adati, “Palibe chidzudzulo kwa inu tsiku lalero ndipo Mulungu akukhululukireni inu. Iye ndiye wokhululukira mwa okhululukira onse.”
“Pitani ndi malaya angawa ndipo mukawaponye pamaso pa abambo anga ndipo maso awo adzayambanso kuona. Ndipo mukabwere, ndi abale anu onse kwa ine.”
Ndipo pamene gulu la a paulendo lidanyamuka, atate awo adati, “Ndikumva fungo la Yosefe ngati inu muganiza kuti nzeru zanga zatha.”
Iwo adati, “Pali Mulungu! Iwe ndiwe wosokonekera kuyambira kale.”
